response:

Buddhism places a strong emphasis on mindfulness and self-reflection, which can help individuals develop a greater awareness of their own thoughts and emotions. This can lead to more honest and open communication with healthcare providers, as well as a greater willingness to follow treatment plans and adhere to medical advice.
